topics.body: Yo; I do have a question guys.  My boss is gay and everyone at my work is totally cool with glbt; I know I've only been working there for a short time, but do you think it would be wise to finally fucking come out? . . . Stupid comment time: I *REALLY* want to crossplay popstar ahri this halloween and I'd rather people know way beforehand that I'm bi and trans rather than spring it at last second and also I don't know what my workplace's policy on that is so I'd rather know beforehand.
